summary: This document is a police report detailing a complaint of criminal mischief involving graffiti on property located at 9 East 71st Street, New York City. The report includes information about the complainant, the nature of the offense, and the responding officers.

persons.name: Liebstein Wex
persons.context: Liebstein Wex reported that unknown individuals spray-painted graffiti on property, causing damage.

persons.name: Richard Barnett
persons.context: Richard Barnett is noted as the reporter of the incident, providing information to the police.

persons.name: Louis Juste
persons.context: Officer Louis Juste is listed as the reporting officer for the complaint.

persons.name: Eileen Camarda
persons.context: Officer Eileen Camarda entered the complaint report into the system.

connections.description: Richard Barnett reported the incident involving Liebstein Wex's property damage.
Both are police officers involved in the investigation and reporting of the incident.

events.title: Graffiti Incident Report
events.description: A report was filed regarding graffiti vandalism on property at 9 East 71st Street.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York City, NY
keyFacts: The incident involved unknown perpetrators spray-painting graffiti on property.
The complaint was classified as criminal mischief.
The report was filed on November 10, 1997, and was marked as completed.
Liebstein Wex is identified as the victim of the graffiti incident.
The report was entered by Officer Eileen Camarda and approved by Officer Louis Juste.
